name: amdld
description: AMD module loader with deterministic and just-in time module initialization
author: Rasmus Andersson <me@rsms.me>

scripts.test: node test/test.js && echo 'testing TypeScript...' && tsc test/tstest.ts && node test/tstest.js
scripts.build: closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED --env BROWSER --js_output_file amdld.min.js --output_wrapper '(function(){%output%}).call(this);' --language_out ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --create_source_map amdld.min.js.map amdld.js
